name: CreativeSetCreate
desc: The response to creating a Creative Set.

items.name: adamId
items.desc: Each time you use an adamId in the API, it must match the adamId in your campaign. Use Get a Campaign or Get All Campaigns to obtain your adamId and correlate it to the correct campaign.

items.name: name
items.desc: The name of the Creative Set.

items.name: languageCode
items.desc: The language code that comes from the media response, such as en-US.

items.name: assetsGenIds
items.desc: An assetGenId contains the relationship between a Creative Set and an asset. Use an assetGenId to return assets that you want to be part of your Creative Set.
